text: Onon [zanoni mutallaqa]-ro dar haddi tavoni xud har co ki xudaton sukunat dored, [va dar tavonii sumost] sukunat dihed va ʙa onho zijon narasoned, to [arsaro] ʙar onon tang kuned [va pes az pojoni idda macʙur ʙa tarki manzil savand] va agar ʙordor hastand, nafaqai onhoro ʙidihed, to vaz'i haml kunand. Pas, agar [farzandatonro] ʙaroi sumo sir medihand, muzdasonro ʙipardozed va [in korro] ʙa neki va ʙo masvarati hamdigar ancom dihed; va agar ʙa tavofuq narasided, pas zani digare [ʙa darxosti savhar] uro sir dihad
